highlights.text: cities have already beenequipped with smart cameras. During the first part of 2018 three thousand video cameras will be installedin seven towns throughout Georgia. The cameras are supported by different analytical software, withcapabilities such as face recognition and automatic number plate recognition. They can identify traffic lightviolations, wrong manoeuvring and speeding.
